displayName.text: Dr. Laura B. Geraldino Pardilla, MD

formattedAddress: 161 Fort Washington Ave 2nd floor, New York, NY 10032, USA
adrFormatAddress: 161 Fort Washington Ave 2nd floor, New York, NY 10032, USA

originalText.text: I'm a current patient of Dr. Geraldino and I'm very pleased with her care. Over the years, I have had my share of irresponsible doctors but I have to say Dr. Geraldino recomendations have been very benefitial to my health, even if they don't follow my selfish desires. Her treatment recommendations helped save my kidneys from major damaged and more complications. Her staff has been more than helpful and efficient. Also, she has given me treatment options following the most advanced medications available for my condition.

text.text: I'm a current patient of Dr. Geraldino and I'm very pleased with her care. Over the years, I have had my share of irresponsible doctors but I have to say Dr. Geraldino recomendations have been very benefitial to my health, even if they don't follow my selfish desires. Her treatment recommendations helped save my kidneys from major damaged and more complications. Her staff has been more than helpful and efficient. Also, she has given me treatment options following the most advanced medications available for my condition.

originalText.text: I had a 15 min video conference that I was charged $500 out of pocket, expensive but not the main issue.  She ultimately recommended the most expensive, and invasive treatment, and steered me away from any holistic or natural based treatments which in her defense is the standard recommendation.  At the end of the call I was sent a referral to get a CT scan to monitor the progression of the disease.  I contacted her office to relay my concerns about moving forward with such an invasive procedure and that I was looking for a second opinion.  I then spent months trying to schedule the CT scan she referred, only to find out that her office was actively refusing to forward the referral letter to the insurance company delaying additional review and treatment. I didn't believe this was retaliatory, but after several imaging centers and months of delays with the same issue I got the message loud and clear. I highly recommend to anyone that doesn't care about their time or money being wasted.
